title: App is getting Closed after installing skiaSharp
body:
I created a new fresh app in vS2017 and installed Skisharp.Views.Forms and  skiaSharp in PCL and Skisharp.Views.Forms ,skiaSharp,skiasharp.views for ios and android  after that the app is getting closed after deploying [new to xamarin] 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4228166/35038222-26945d6c-fba0-11e7-8bd3-af416b6df543.png)
